overview: When Lily Jordan feels homesick being alone in her father's house, she calls her new school friend Jenna Sativa. Teen stepsister Gina Valentina gets teased by her little stepsister James after disclosing her sex dream about big stepsister Ashley Adams. Elsa Jean looks for solace from her sister's girlfriend Jill Kassidy after she moves away. Jenna Sativa plays a game of truth or dare with sorority sisters Gia Paige, Kasey Warner and Jojo Kiss after she delivers them pizza.
tagline: Sisters, Students, Pizza Gals And More!
title: Three Little Sisters
